newsitem.title: USA: David Bowie to release first Internet single.
newsitem.headline: David Bowie to release first Internet single.

text.p: Rock singer David Bowie will release his latest single "Telling Lies" on September 11 exclusively on the Internet, his record company said on Tuesday.

The song will be available on Bowie's official Internet site (http://www.davidbowie.com), and may be heard on the site or downloaded in compact disc quality, but will not be sold in stores or heard on the radio.
Virgin Records said on Tuesday the release is the first time a major artist has released a full song on the Internet, the world-wide computer network.
Fans will be able to download, for free, three different versions of the song, which was recorded in New York where Bowie is working on his next album.
